name: Invent Things!
description:
Try to make money inventing things and selling them at the market. Manage your money and your motivation level to become a successful inventor!

Made in one week for the How Have You Been? Jam.

Music by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com), Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/)

Sound Effects from Freesound.org, licensed under the CC0 license. (https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)

SPOILER:

Don't read this if you just want to experience the game as intended. I just wanted to let you know that this game is actually winnable, but the strategy to win is so long and tedious no reasonable person would ever do it, which is kind of the point.
